```{r}
set.seed(23)
RM_norm(N = 2, cplx = T, herm = T)
```


```{r}
# Set seed
set.seed(23)
# Parameters
size <- 5
N <- 5
beta <- 100
complex <- F
# Ensemble spectrum
ensemble <- RME(RM_beta, args = list(N, beta, complex), ensemble_size = 1000)
spectrum_plot(ensemble)
```


```{r}
# Set seed
set.seed(23)
ensemble <- RME(RM_normal, args = list(n = 100, mean = 0, sd = 1, symm = F, complex = T, hermitian = F), size = 50)
spectrum_plot(ensemble)
```
